name: Sewer Simulator
description:
Instructions:

Move AD

increase your score by collecting yellow gems

click to slam into enemies to increase score

Jump with space

teleport with the big green thing

I have a lot of experience with poop.  I have had green poop.  Red poop.  Even brown on occasion.  I have worked in a sewer, so I thought for my first game I would make it sewer related.  Unfortunately, I underestimated how bad I am at programming.  This was all I could do.  This game did not reach a 4th of me or my graphic's designer's vision, and I did not have time to import nearly any of my graphic designer's assets.  Oops lol.  But we had a lot of fun so it's cool.  

This is literally so scuffed and bad its not even funny.  The only reason I'm proud of this is its my first game that I wasn't following a tutorial.
